entry.title: New release for Postiz: X long post
entry.content:
I just added the ability to write long posts if you have a premium account. When adding a new account, it saves the current verified state and, according to that, limits your post in the preview.

You can edit the settings from the channels menu and switch if it's verified or not.

entry.title: New release for Postiz: AI image
entry.content: Added the option to generate AI images quickly for each post in the list.
